main event: A round blue object, the size of a ball, was observed hovering and descending before disappearing below the horizon in Pound & Nekoosa, Wisconsin, on November 13, 1956.
interesting points: The object blinked off and on at intervals of less than a second., The observer noted that at times the object's size appeared smaller than its actual size., The total sighting duration was about one minute., The observation was made by civilians., The conclusion of the report suggested that the object was probably a balloon.
